channel.title: T0 shield
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is all the tiered shields from Realm of the Mad god. Well all of the shields have the same design, just different colors. (Except the Untired Ogmur Shield). So I'm just showing the t0 color
Wireframe: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UFtMHZL.png[/img] Render front: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zPEmDIS.png[/img] Render back: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hTF84hV.png[/img]
Now you may or may not have noticed that the handle looks a little off.... Well it is. I wasn't sure how to make one but I tried. :)
What do you all think of it? Tips on what I can do better?

item.title: T0 shield
item.dc:creator: @iml0linghard iml0linghard
item.description:
@iml0linghard wrote:

Looks nice mate! Good job. And I think the handle looks fine.

Read full topic
